qas.question: What unit is named after Bell?
What does the bel and decibel measure?
In what field is the Alexander Graham Bell Medal given out?
What was the first year the Alexander Graham Bell Medal was given out?

context: <a0_0>The bel<a0_0/> (B) and the smaller decibel (dB) are units of measurement of <a1_0>sound intensity<a1_0/> invented by <a2_0>Bell Labs<a2_0/> and named after him. [N 28] Since <a4_0>1976<a4_0/> the IEEE's Alexander Graham Bell Medal has been awarded to honor outstanding contributions in the field of <a3_0>telecommunications<a3_0/>.
